name: Xiaofeng Mao (毛潇锋)
description:
I currently work as an algorithm engineer at [Alibaba Artificial Intelligence Governance Laboratory (AAIG)](https://s.alibaba.com/cn/aaig/home). I received my MS degree from Harbin Engineering University. Before that, I received B.S. degree from Northeast University.
My current research interests include Computer Vision and Big Foundation Models.
